meaning_str.bing:
n. 裤子；短裤；内裤；次品
v. “pant”的第三人称单数
网络. 长裤；裤装；下装

<美>裤子；长裤；<英>短裤；内裤；<美>女装裤子；<英俚>胡说；废话；次品；劣质品
气喘；喘息；[文]心跳；胸部的起伏；喷气声；（pant的复数）
喘气；喘息；渴望；渴求；（pant的第三人称单数）
<英口>无价值的；极坏的；糟糕的；低劣的
哼；呸（用于表达不赞同或不喜欢）

1.en: Chuck Norris puts his pants on one leg at a time, just like the rest of us. The only difference is, then he kills people.
1.cn: 穿内裤的时候先穿一条腿……就像我们那样。唯一不同的是他接之后就杀人。

2.en: "Okay. " But he sounded disappointed, as if he had been hoping had one stuffed down my pants right then. "How much? "
2.cn: “好。”他的声音听起来有些失望，好象是希望有什么人可以立马就把海报塞到我裤子里似的。“多少钱？”

3.en: He was extremely untidy, He used to come home with a face of smudges, an inkspattered shirt, a pair of dirt-bedraggled pants.
3.cn: 他非常地不整洁。回家时，他常常是脸上满是污点，衬衣上沾满墨水渍，裤子上全是尘土。

0.en: He must've had on some really nice pants.
0.cn: 那他穿的裤子一定十分考究。

1.en: Sweetie, put the pants on. Putting them on.
1.cn: 亲爱的，把裤子穿上。穿了穿了。

2.en: Pull your pants up, Patrick. We're going home.
2.cn: 把你的裤子拉上去，派崔克。我们回家了。

3.en: What the hell is an otter? Lane 20. White pants.
3.cn: 水獭基佬是什么啊？20号赛道穿白裤子的。

4.en: Yeah, but those really go better with pants. Maybe I should wear pants?
4.cn: 有，不过那种适合配裤子，或者我该穿裤子。

5.en: Hey. Hello, Sir. You're here to return those pants? No, these are my pants.
5.cn: 你好，要退还那件裤子吗？不，这是我的裤子。

6.en: Yeah, pants, what an idea. Or better yet, how about you go without any pants.
6.cn: 对了，穿裤子是好主意，或者不要穿裤子更好。

8.en: Maybe it's wherever your pants are. Nope, pants in the microwave, no notebook.
8.cn: 也许跟你的裤子在同个地方。不，裤子在微波炉里，笔记本不在。

9.en: Pheebs, those are those are Santa pants. What? Santa pants. Santa Claus's pants.
9.cn: 菲比，那是圣诞裤。什么？圣诞裤。圣诞老人的裤子。

10.en: And this is Belt. Cook, conversationalist, navigator. Also, keeps my pants up. What are "pants up"?
10.cn: 这个是皮带猴，负责做饭，聊天，指路，还有帮我提着裤子。"提着裤子"是什么?

11.en: Well, I'm just, if the paste matches the pants, you can make yourself a pair of paste pants and she won't know the difference.
11.cn: 如果跟裤子的颜色一样，你就糊一条假裤子，她就看不出来了。

12.en: For $10, I'll send them a selfie in the new pants that they bought. For $20, I'll send them a selfie without pants.
12.cn: 给10块，我会给他们寄一张我穿着他们合资买的新裤子的照片。给20元，我给他们寄没穿裤子的照片。

13.en: Where's my damn letter from the pants company, saying, "girl, those things are tired. Here's a new pair for free"?
13.cn: 裤子公司怎么不给我来封信啊，写着 “姑娘，您的裤子太旧了，所以给您免费送一条裤子。”

14.en: You took off your pants and climbed under the sheets. I was tired.
14.cn: 你脱了裤子钻进被子里。我累了。

15.en: Sorry it took so long. I couldn't find my pants. I don't know how they made it all the way to the loading dock.
15.cn: 抱歉，让你久等了，刚才找了好久裤子，都不知道我裤子是怎么跑到装货区的。

16.en: What? You've got some on your pants. I'll just throw them out.
16.cn: 怎么了？你裤子上也沾到了。干脆丢掉算了。

17.en: And action. If I achieve my goal, specifically, a new pair of quality pants，then I promise I will give back to the community, wearing said pants. All I need is $1,500.
17.cn: 开始，如果我达到目的，具体来说 就是买到一条新的高档裤子，那我保证我会穿着那条裤子回报社会，我只需要一千五。

18.en: So you're saying, if I wear these pants, I might be getting into hers?
18.cn: 你是说我若穿这条裤子，她会允许我侵犯？

19.en: Oh, yes, please. A pair of pants. And my toothbrush. Yeah, and my mail.
19.cn: 拜托你了，带条裤子，我的牙刷，我的信。
